desc: Located In Leicester, The Snug Beauty & Wellbeing Salon offers high quality spa-grade treatments including; Massage, Facial, Body Wrap, Manicure, Waxing, Tanning.

layout.text: Based In the vibrant and leafy area of Clarendon Park Leicester, The Snug Beauty & Wellbeing Salon awaits to indulge you in a spa experience that is on your doorstep
